Body:
n_workers = 4
worker_arguments = [('hyperparams', HyperparameterSamples({'multiply_by': 2
    })) for _ in range(n_workers)]
p = ParallelQueuedFeatureUnion([('1', n_workers, worker_arguments,
    MultiplyByN())], batch_size=10, max_queue_size=5)
outputs = p.transform(list(range(100)))
expected = np.array(list(range(0, 200, 2)))
assert np.array_equal(outputs, expected)
